name: minions
description: A universal structured object system for AI agents & systems

scripts.build: pnpm --filter minions-sdk run build && pnpm --filter minions-cli run build && pnpm --filter minions-docs run build && pnpm --filter minions-web run build
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter minions-sdk run build && pnpm --filter minions-sdk run lint && pnpm --filter minions-cli run lint
scripts.deploy:docs: pnpm --filter minions-docs run build && NETLIFY_SITE_ID=1475df2e-cdf5-47c9-a74d-a7546b5588db netlify deploy --dir apps/docs/dist --prod --no-build
scripts.deploy:web: pnpm --filter minions-web run build && NETLIFY_SITE_ID=dc7f9774-63cf-420d-8553-a713d8f6c2dd netlify deploy --dir apps/web/dist --prod --no-build
scripts.deploy: pnpm run deploy:docs && pnpm run deploy:web

author: Mehdi Nabhani <mehdi@the-mehdi.com> (https://the-mehdi.com)
